_xResult.title: Mizrahi Reversible Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made natural jacket with bell-sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
Naturally realistic, authentic and yourself, you walk through life in a dream-like state. The universe has your back and you can tell you know it. Serene and at peace, but never complacent, you have the secret to life in the palm of your hands.

 

Be authentically you in this hand-crafted, wearable masterpiece. The linen is effortlesley eye-catching in its less-processed state and the tie-closure and bell-sleeves add the perfect level of sophisticated detail.

 

Please specify the main color you want in the swatch selector, and also please specify if you want a contrasting color on the inside of the collar and cuffs (use the box to specify contrast color). Aiste custom made to measure coats fit better and can be customized for length and color. Have sloping shoulders, or one higher than the other? Let us know and we can make adjustments.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
